Cats.name: Cats
Cats.reason: Even just I see them, I feel happiness and relax. They are fluffy, soft, and extremely cute.

Sweets.name: Sweets
Sweets.reason: I've been addicted to sweets since I was little. There is no reason, just my body wants.

Coffee.name: Coffee
Coffee.reason: When I realized coffee and chocolate are best friend, I fail love with coffee. When I study, coffee is a good supporter, when I go to a cafe, coffee is a good friend.
